patthana8.67:1.1: Nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.67:2.1: Nanakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.67:3.1: Nakāmāvacarañca nanakāmāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.67:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.
